name: Serpus
description:
Search the map, discover weapons, beat the boss....death is inevitable

All art, music and code was made in the 48 hours. 

Music progress depending on both your and the bosses health

Made for the SA game jam 2021

Submitted in 49.5 hours (minus 2.5 hours for load shedding).

Controls:

WASD - move

Q - switch weapons

E - interact

Space - dodge

Known bugs: light sometimes doesn't turn on in dark side rooms, just leave and re-enter

Just to be clear for Jam category: 3/8 of us are students, all of us are hobbyists
